definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to receive (praise, an education, punishment etc)/to be ...ed (praised, educated, punished etc)
to feel/to sense/to have the feeling that/to think that/to move/to affect
to think of/to call to mind/to anticipate
to meet/to run into/to come across
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他专心一志地做生意，在几年中就赚到许多钱。

sentences.english: 'Madame has gone to Paris, ' Nanine answered.
sentences.chinese: “太太到巴黎去了，”纳尼娜回答我说。

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面仅就已观察到的几种伞形科植物的反应予以说明。

sentences.english: He clipped an electronic pulse reader tohis finger.
sentences.chinese: 他把电子脉搏计夹到手指上。

sentences.english: Around 4-6% of elderly people have experienced some form of maltreatment at home.
sentences.chinese: 约有4%到6%的老人在家中受到某种形式的虐待。

sentences.english: In Los Angeles you need to take a connecting flight to New York.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉矶您需要转乘中转联程航班到纽约。

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一个小男孩下到马达加斯加南部的一个蓝宝石矿里。

sentences.english: Zhu told a group of us.
sentences.chinese: 朱先生对着我们一群人说到。

sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: But in the third week of May, currents drew some of the oil southeast.
sentences.chinese: 但到了5月的第三周，洋流开始把浮油带向东南方向。

sentences.english: He teaches all liberal sciences and gives account of dead souls that died in sin.
sentences.chinese: 他各人文科学和教给到死，死在仲心灵。

sentences.english: A Confederate boat carried Fox to Sumter.
sentences.chinese: 一艘邦联的船只将福克斯运送到萨姆特堡。

sentences.english: Her hair flowed over her shoulder.
If you go to Aberdeen on Hong Kong Island, you will see Ocean Park.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到港岛香港仔，你会看到海洋公园。

sentences.english: But sooner or later we will return to our emotional set-point.
sentences.chinese: 但是迟早我们会返回到我们的情感点。

sentences.english: Are all students of the Department of International Finance here?
sentences.chinese: 国际金融系的学生是否都到了？

definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
